value:
So war has come to this world as well,
and its people suffer for it. Seems
there's work for me to do here.

My father once led the Greil
Mercenaries. Every person under his
command trusted him fully.

Let me take some chores off your
hands so you can take a break. I'll...
Hmm... I'll go chop some firewood!

This is Urvan, my father's axe... It's
rugged and strong. It reminds me of
him.

Using an axe is different from using a
sword. This guy requires power over
skill. I need to get stronger.

I'm Ike, from the Greil Mercenaries.
I have a message for you. It's from
$Nf.

Swinging this axe is becoming
second nature.

Seems my body is finally getting
used to this.

My training still has a long way to
go.

I guess that means I need to work
a bit harder around here now.

I'm Ike of the Greil Mercenaries. And
this axe is Urvan. You might call it my
current partner.

I had the strangest dream... It was of
another world, and there were entire
crowds calling my name.$k$pCountless people, all cheering for me.
Can you believe it? I don't pretend to
understand magic, but...$k$pWell, it wouldn't surprise me if that
cheering is why I was summoned
to this world.$k$pBut if that is the case...I have to
make sure I don't let them down.$k$pI'm no knight, and certainly no
nobleman. My father was my only
example of how a man should be.$k$pSo I need to carry out his vision and
make sure our mercenary company is
something he would be proud of.$k$pTo fight for the people, not for the
money... That is my desire.
おおぉっ！
行くぞ！
うああっ！
倒れるわけには…！
Thanks to all!
It ends here.
I will defeat you!
With gratitude.
Argh... I'm sorry...
Haha
This reminds me of something my father wore.
Hmm? What is it? Do you need something?
I had a strange dream. Thousands of people... And they were all saying my name!
I was called to this world to answer the wishes of many. Or so it seems.
I can't really remember that dream I had. But I do remember that you helped me.
Father, watch over me. One day, I swear...
I'm grateful to you. You've done so much for me. You are a true friend.
Understood.
Orders?
It's all for you.
